1372: Verthwi was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1372.
1389: Verthwi moved to Cromme straet.C.8 after marriage.
Got married to Vastraid at age 18 in 1389.
1373: Lost sibling Laurens in 1373 when Laurens was 4.
1374: Lost mother at the age of 2 in childbirth.
1388: Lost sibling Saswe in 1388 when Saswe was 15.
1392: Gave birth to Uergina in 1392 at age 20.
1395: Gave birth to Liudburgis in 1395 at age 23.
1396: Gave birth to Cees in 1396 at age 24.
Lost daughter Uergina when Uergina was 5 years old.
Lost daughter Liudburgis when Liudburgis was 2 years old.
1398: Gave birth to Imsoete in 1398 at age 26.
